thread.section_title: Villa Beaumarchais - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our Stay
thread.title_full: Our Stay - Review of Villa Beaumarchais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: markmP4578SN
title: Our Stay
text:
Stayed at Villa Beaumarchais for 5 Days after travelling significantly through the UK and parts of Europe before heading back to Australia. We enjoyed our stay there the hotel was clean and tidy the staff were always helpful and it was close to the metro stations and lots of restaurants and bars
The only issue we had was we discovered that a cleaner was helping themselves to some of our own personal alcohol. We addressed this reception and they were concerned to hear about this
All in all a very good stay and would stay there again
